00009 void MarkMapIndexDirty( INT32 iMapIndex )
00010 {
00011       gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_REDRAW;
00012       SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_MARKED );
00013 }
00014 
00015 void CenterScreenAtMapIndex( INT32 iMapIndex )
00016 {
00017       INT16 sWorldX, sWorldY;
00018       INT16 sCellX, sCellY;
00019 
00020       //Get X, Y world GRID Coordinates
00021       sWorldY = ( iMapIndex / WORLD_COLS );
00022       sWorldX = iMapIndex - ( sWorldY * WORLD_COLS );
00023 
00024       //Convert into cell coords
00025       sCellY = sWorldY * CELL_Y_SIZE;
00026       sCellX = sWorldX * CELL_X_SIZE;
00027 
00028       //Set the render values, so that the screen will render here next frame.
00029       gsRenderCenterX = sCellX;
00030       gsRenderCenterY = sCellY;
00031 
00032       SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00033 }
00034 
00035 void MarkWorldDirty()
00036 {
00037       SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00038 }
